description: Hello! My name is Alex and I am a recent computer science graduate. I'm currently an Apprentice Web Developer for Moove-it in Austin, Texas. I'm currently focusing on learning the ins-and-outs of JavaScript and React. I previously focused on using Java to create native android mobile-apps. My latest app is named 'Pazaak Cantina - The Card Game' and can be found on the Google Play Store - check it out!
